xmlText.p: First Period_1, Carolina, Pesce 2 (Staal, Aho), 0:14. 2, Carolina, Di Giuseppe 1 (Hanifin, Lindholm), 14:43. 3, Carolina, Aho 20 (Pesce, Slavin), 19:04. Penalties_Carolina bench, served by Williams (too many men on the ice), 11:28; Edler, VAN, (holding stick), 11:54; Del Zotto, VAN, (roughing), 19:55; Skinner, CAR, (roughing), 19:55.
Second Period_4, Vancouver, Del Zotto 4 (Biega, Baertschi), 3:30. Penalties_Gudbranson, VAN, (interference), 6:25; Horvat, VAN, (holding), 15:41.
Third Period_5, Carolina, Williams 10 (Skinner), 7:27. Penalties_Dahlbeck, CAR, Major (fighting), 4:23; Archibald, VAN, Major (fighting), 4:23; Hanifin, CAR, (high sticking), 18:40.
Goalies_Vancouver, Markstrom 15-19-5 (33 shots-29 saves). Carolina, Darling 10-14-6 (22-21).
